title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: I am unable to assign a command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination. When I try to reassign the key via the key preference page, it displays Ctrl+Del instead of Ctrl+Backspace. I am using a Swiss German keyboard with the Swiss German locale.
OB: The keybinding manager incorrectly identifies the Ctrl+Backspace key combination as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.
SR: The keybinding manager should correctly identify the Ctrl+Backspace key combination and allow me to assign a command to it.
